attributes.action: To make a sentence for a person killing another and manslaughter a life sentence
attributes.additional_details:
The judges in U.K leaving family members, family friends heartbroken and in total disbelief when they are not looking at evidence properly and giving killers a low sentence for murders and manslaughter. So they needs to be some action took. As people quote “life for a life”.

Also in the paper Daily Mirror,  2 males walk free after they was driving around with a dying teenage girl in a car when she needed medical treatment as soon as possible so that needs to be looked into as well.
attributes.background: There are a lot of manslaughters and killings going on in this world which is sickening and heartbreaking for family, friends,loved ones etc

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
